heading: Marketing and print design
description: A creative piece of marketing and print design from a university project focused on famine. Following Oxfam's 'Be Humankind' branding really helped bring it to life.
text: Before anybody gets excited, I'm afraid I didn't produce this for Oxfam. I wish it were the case, but this was part of a university project focused on famine. Following Oxfam's 'Be Humankind' branding really helped bring it to life.
You'd struggle to ignore the bold headline and blood-stained hands; the perspective invokes a sense of responsibility, pulling on your heartstrings.
